software.description:
DMRITool is a free and open source toolbox for diffusion MRI data processing. It is written in C++ with Matlab interface. You can also use the released mex executables in matlab.

DMRITool website:
https://diffusionmritool.github.io/

Latest source code:
https://github.com/DiffusionMRITool/dmri...

Mailing list:
http://www.nitrc.org/mailman/listinfo/dm...

DMRITool is currently supported in SQITS at NIH
https://science.nichd.nih.gov/confluence...

With DMRITool, you can:

* perform reconstruction/estimation of diffusion data, including diffusion weighted signal, ensemble average propagator (EAP), diffusion orientation distribution function (dODF), and some meaningful scalar maps, etc.
* generate spherically uniform sampling schemes for single or multiple shells.
* perform diffusion MRI data simulation.
* visualize spherical function field (e.g. dODF field, EAP profile field)
